data.text:
Leiber, Fritz

THE WANDERER

New York: Ballantine Books, Inc., 1969. Bob Abbett. First edition, second printing. Paperback. Fine. Item #51288

Ballantine book number 01635. Cover price 75¢. Cover artist Richard Powers. Hugo Award winner, 1965. "Superior Leiber." Referenced in Barron, Anatomy of Wonder 1987, *3-253, also in Magill, Survey of Science Fiction Literature pp 2396 - 2401. A hint of a rub along the top edge of the front cover, else a fine and bright copy.
